website_summaries.verdict: The design on this power strip allows the outlet faces to rotate in order for you to be able to accommodate larger plugs.
pros: Power strip provides a good solution to a common problem
Design allows you to be able to use all eight outlets
Includes hooks to help you keep your power cords going in the right direction
cons: The sockets on this power strip can be a little loose, causing some cords to fall out easily

customer_reviews.title: A bit better....
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea but there’s not enough tension in the sockets, so things come unplugged really easily. EDIT: Company contacted me very quickly about the issue and sent a replacement unit. The new unit is a bit better with socket tension. Fantastic customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Potential fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: I think the product was wonderful but today it had a large spark and power in most of my home was turned off. I don’t know if this was defective but it was very disconcerting. It’s possible my Home may have burned of I wasn’t home.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelia

customer_reviews.title: Great Design!
customer_reviews.text: Love, it! The pivoting outlets allow more room for those pesky, bulky power converters. I went from two power strips and an extension cord to just one power distribution. See my before and after photos. Note: the after photo shows the power cord portion wrapped in a large bundle since the wall outlet was so close to the power strip and my goal was to get all cords off the floor (easier to vacuum the carpet). All cable wraps and mounting hardware are NOT included.
customer_reviews.author: GizmoGuy

customer_reviews.title: Bought this item because of the rotating receptacles. Probably ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item because of the rotating receptacles. Probably works well if you have a single standard plug. I used it to connect things laptop computers, other times that had large conversion plugs, The items would not stay plugs in, they kept falling out of the sockets. So did not work well for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Staffingpro

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Design
customer_reviews.text: This product is good and bad. The design is creative and works great for managing multiple power supplies. BUT, the receptacles for whatever reason are so loose that they come right out. Bad design flaw that isn't a total deal breaker, but you got to wonder why this problem would even exist in such a great product. It's a plug and a receptacle. Never had a problem with fit.
customer_reviews.author: Turk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This surge protector is the best i have had by far. I finally got one where i can use all the outlets without one or more being covered by a large power brick or angled plug and being able to move the direction of each outlet 180 degrees is so helpful to accomplish this and it is not the size of a college text book. The added clips makes it easy to keep the cords tight to the wall so i am not tripping on them or getting them tangled together. "highly recommend this."
customer_reviews.author: Cneasaigh

customer_reviews.title: Loose and failing slots
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. So fair there are 2 slots that no longer produce power. All the slots are loose and I have to use TAPE the hold them in securely. I don't feel these are safe!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Product showed up defective.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this power strip in a pinch needing a quick power source. Recieved Item today and it was defective from the box. Power button does not function and had to rig it up with a piece of electrical tape in order to get it to feed power to the outlets. Definitely would not recommend this to others. Look elsewhere for a better power strip.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I loved the 1st so I came back for more!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Like them so much I purchased a 3rd one as a Christmas gift. I loved the 1st so I came back for more. Wish they had made these before instead of having the need to purchase additional ones because I couldn't use all the outlets that were supposedly available. It is so good that now I just have to make sure I am not trying to suck too much juice out of the wall at one time lol How did it take so long for someone to think of this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: diditKJ

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: While this is a great outlet strip I noticed a big FAIL when I went to ply it in. The outlet it needs to plug in is a Zwave outlet. If you have any of these you know the smart outlet is always on the bottom. I have under cabinet lighting plugged into the lower outlet and this plug has a non-rotating power cord which makes it unable to be plugged into the top outlet and be able to utilize the lower outlet. I had to purchase an extender with a rotating power plug to make it useable where I need it. If it had this I would be a 5 Star product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: johng

customer_reviews.title: Finally a power strip solution
customer_reviews.text: With electric plug ins getting larger and larger, using a power strip has gotten near impossible. This one solves the problem. You can twist the outlets around to accommodate those large cords plug ins and actually be able to use all of the outlets available. I have two in my office for all of my computer equipment and couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: J's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: i've had this since August 2018 and it's stopped working. i will certainly never buy this brand again, nor anything from this seller. it should have lasted more than one year!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Crocitto

customer_reviews.title: Own about 4 or 5 of these - Zero damage after almost 2 yrs
customer_reviews.text: I got SICK AND TIRED of FL electrical storms ruining routers, printers and other equipment in my house, so I did my research and bought these. I would even (prior to buying these), turn off all computers and unplug everything from the wall when we had a storm come through. Ugh. Since I have snagged these, zero damage so far. Of course I'd be hosed in a direct lightning strike, or even if it hit a nearby tree, but there's no avoiding that really. Kind of pricey (for me), but since I've never turned off & unplugged anything since, haven't lost any equipment due to storms.
customer_reviews.author: Wee, Morsel and Bumble Bee

customer_reviews.title: By Kathryn's request
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally respond to solicitations for a review (you can ask my LinkedIn colleagues). However Kathryn asked nicely and this is a worthy product. I replaced a socket expander, giving me six sockets from two wall outlets, and a seven-socket power strip of which I could only plug in three power cubes because of their bulk. This does what it says, seems rugged enough for garage/power tools use, and has an attractiveness all it's own. It's a little pricey but as an early adopter I'm okay with that. Once Echogear amortizes its engineering costs you should see it from them for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wm Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great for managing cables!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a while back, and after a thunderstorm, it was time to write a review. I don't have an UPS system for my kid's computer, so it is currently hooked up to this strip. Two power outages, and the equipment performed greatly! Also, the ability to rotate the plug allows to use every single outlet with easy, and it doesn't look quite messy when you arrange it properly. Considering the UPS will be ordered soon, I will not be using this for his computer anymore, but will definitely keep it handy for my electronics, as it performed as stated. This is a definite recommendation for the product!
customer_reviews.author: Raf C

customer_reviews.title: One of the best designed power strips
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent power strip. Outside of the surge protection, which is always a plus, the design is sheer perfection. So many power strips don't give you the flexibility to put in various size plugs - this certainly does and with a nice, slim design. If they offered a discount to purchase more than one, I would consider replacing every power strip in my home.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gold

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if you (the reader of this review) have the same problem, I do, of the AC prongs for an electrical device being boxy, thus making it difficult to plug in said item to your power strip, with other outlets occupied, but with this particular power strip having rotating AC outlets, that's no longer an issue. For this simple reason, I recommend this unique power strip. PS: I almost never give 5 stars, I may have missed a minute problem with an item, because there's always room for improvement
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Noble

customer_reviews.title: It will save all electronic’s that are plugged in when there’s a voltage surge..
customer_reviews.text: I like that this power strip has the rotating sockets and two that are stationary. The only problem with the two power strips that I have are there is a light for protection on which is red and a light for ground is supposed to be glowing green to show that the ground is protected, I had to ask the electrician that is rewiring our house due to a tree trimmer that the neighbors hired dropped a tree limb on the neighbors power line which ended up shorting out our system causing $35,000 In damage. Except for the protected power strips that saved our electronics.
customer_reviews.author: PjRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the most versatile surge protector I have ever had. I love the way you can twist and turn the plugs. When you have odd shape plugs with most surge protectors it's a problem configuring how to make everything fit but not with the ECHOGEAR! It also has a place to keep your cords organized. While having 2160 joules one of the highest I've ever seen is a plus! I would recommend this to anyone who have large appliances and not enough outlet space. I love the way it is a long tubular shape and it can be hung on the wall out of the way! Good value for the money too.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Love

customer_reviews.title: Lots of plugs
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for my daughters dorm room for college and with her computer, lights, led lights, charger, refrig, coffee pot, and so much more this power strip worked the best and is very durable. I like how the plug shows your protected and the protection is one of the highest I found on here. The strip comes with a super long thick cord that is very flexible and easy to secure to a wall or the floor. I would recommend this surge protector for a place you need a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Versatile - have bought two now and will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought another one of these for my computer set up after the first one worked so well for my TV set up. It's reliable, functions well (the outlets are not difficult to rotate,. It not too easy, either), and I really like being able to fit all these odd plugs into a single surge protector easily instead of having to play Tetris with a flat/ordinary surge protector. I also like that the on/off switch is a button instead of traditional switch, because it decreases the chances of an accidental shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Monkasaurus Rex

customer_reviews.title: A plug strip for all the wall warts or power blocks that today's devices have!
customer_reviews.text: I had a perfectly good power strip that had plenty of outlets. And I couldn't use a good deal of them because there's no room for the block that the plugs have. On this, the two outlets at the bottom of the 'stick' are fixed, but they are opposite each other, so you can still use plugs with bricks on them. Each of the other outlets rotate away from the center, so you can use whatever size power brick comes with your device and still be able to make use of the entire plug strip.
customer_reviews.author: Smurphette

customer_reviews.title: Finally,  A Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: After years and years of using skimpy power strips, I decided to buy something a bit better. This unit is well built and pretty much stays in place and lays flat. The rotating outlets work well and now I can fit everything into it. The surge protection should be adequate and the fact that it's fireproof is a big plus. This power outlet system looks and feels like it will last a long time. It's got some heft to it. Highly recommended. Used for Smart TV, sound system, DVD, VCR, cable box power, high speed Internet power and phone charger, with one outlet free. If they make a smaller unit, I might buy it for my computer as an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Majewski

customer_reviews.title: Randomly failed for no apparent reason
customer_reviews.text: This power strip failed less than 6 months of owning it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ and let me reduce from 2 powerstrips down to 1.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a powerstrip for my entertainment stand that could accommodate those infuriating "covers the outlet next to it" plugs, in addition to normal ones. The twisting outlets is brilliant, and work as expected. It was a bit bulkier than I expected, but I was putting the entire strip inside the entertainment cabinet for easy access, so that wasn't an issue. I only mention it's bulk in case anyone is looking for a low profile or slim design - this isn't for you. As for the functionality, so far, no issues with it. Works like a champ and let me reduce from 2 powerstrips to 1.
customer_reviews.author: Miken

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get a bunch of wall-warts together.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get a bunch of wall-warts together. Had to install a rotating outlet to have this and another surge suppressor for entertainment and networking cabinet. Would be nice if plug was offset or rotating.
customer_reviews.author: Karl M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits in Tight Spaces
customer_reviews.text: Most important to me is the high quality surge protection. Additionally I wanted enough outlets to handle all of my computer related cables, which this strip has provided with extras, actually. The narrow strip allows me to tuck this surge protector out of the way in my small office area. It looks and feels like the high quality product that is promised in the manufacturers description.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I loved the flexbile design. I have a large laptop adapter, another large phone charging adapter, another large lamp adapter, another large hair dryer adapter and up to now, it wasn't possible to plug all of them in one surge protector. It's working great, very flexible. I especially loved the side plugs, they allowed us to plug stuff from different distances and angles. It's what we've been looking for for years. We bought six of them and we're using all of them in different rooms.
customer_reviews.author: ayca

customer_reviews.title: awesome design!
customer_reviews.text: These days we have so many electronics & they have different style plugs so even if you buy an 8 outlet surge protector you only end up being able to use half of them. The swivel design of this surge protector is genius!! I also noticed they have one that just plugs into the wall as well which is also great depending on which type you are in need of. I am also glad I don't have to worry about my electronics getting fried while they are plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Melody w.

customer_reviews.title: Energizes my desk space
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking around quite a bit for surge protector strips and this one really knocked it out of the park. I love that each section can rotate so that equipment that use annoying, fat-brick plugs don't triple park. I agree with another reviewer that said that this does have a decent size footprint but if you do the measuring yourself with the space you have, it'll make things easier before buying. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brahmology, LLC

customer_reviews.title: THOUGHT IT HAD 360 DEGREE ROTATING WALL PLUG
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely well designed and made product. We've thrown all our surge protectors away and replaced them with Echogear. Now we can use all the outlets instead of just a few, as most of our devices have bulky plugs which prevent access to many outlets. The only disappointment is that this unit does not have a 360 degree rotating plug (as several others like Belkin do), which would make our Echogears even more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmo

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: This tripped the breakers on the first two sockets I tried it in, after making a buzz and then smelling of an electrical short. Before returning it I decided to give it one more go and this time it stayed on. So not a great impression so far, see how it goes from here.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: A Power Strip Long Needed
customer_reviews.text: The Echogear Power Strip is just what the doctor ordered. How many times have you lost outlets due to bulky plugs. Now, with this power strip you can move those bulky plugs out of the way so you may use all the outlets instead of just some. I also like the feature which allows you to tie-down wires to avoid a tangle. If there is one thing which would have been helpful, it would have been allowing tie-downs in both directions as sometimes your wires don't go in the direction the manufacturer thinks it should go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavyweight surge protector. Very versatile especially if you have those larger charger plugs that are too boxy for a regular even spaced extension. I also think the longer cord helps. I don’t like putting anything electrical on the floor or rugs so the long cord allows me to place the extension higher up on a desk (in my case a dresser). It’s a thick cord which I trust will be able to handle the length and current going that extra distance. I recommend this item hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Skimbleshanks

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful surge protector with moveable outlets
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Echogear product purchased and the second one that is definitely worth purchasing. I needed a new multi-outlet surge protector for an older HD TV and peripheral equipment. Plus I wanted something black since my TV, stand and all cords are black. It blends in much better. The flexible, movable outlets are wonderful and there is no wasted outlet space when one plug in is big. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shiflett

customer_reviews.title: Can be conformed to meet your needs
customer_reviews.text: I have very little space around my work area in which the battery back-up takes most of the room. I was having problems with the back-up not lasting long because of having so many other "non-important" items plugged in to it. I was able to plug most of the odd shaped plug in items like speakers, scanners, clocks etc in to this and keep only the computer and screen on the battery back-up. Each outlet will twist and move so there is more space.
customer_reviews.author: O-BAR4707

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We put out a LOT of Halloween decorations (inside) that have large adapter style plugs. Because of this, you can't fit very many of them on a standard power strip or extension cord. Six of these outlets rotate so that you can move the plugs out of each other's way. There are 2 more outlets with plenty of space, but they don't move. With this one device I replaced two power strips and an extension cord. I didn't do any research on the surge protection feature, but I feel like this is a great product. Especially if you're dealing with large plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This ends the wasted plug-in receptacles.
customer_reviews.text: This power strip is unique in many ways, all of the plug-in receptacles swivel, so there's no wasted receptacles to deal with, it's compact, compared to the one I had before, of which many of the receptacles were useless, because of transformers that covered the next plug-in to it. Where I have this power strip located, the area is very limited, and it fits perfectly. Over all, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Invention!  Why didn’t they think of this before? Versatile. Safer power strip than most.
customer_reviews.text: You know the problem with power strips, right? Well, the problem is that, ever though a power strip may have many outlets, often time, charging blocks cover more than one outlet, with the result that you end up with only have the outlets being available. This power strip solves that problem by allowing the outlets to rotate around its core. Wonderful invention!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Not true to description
customer_reviews.text: It advertised 8 outlets which is what I needed and it is only 7. Will have to return it. I like the rotating outlets. Hopefully I can find what I meed
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the ultimate power strip[s]
customer_reviews.text: There are never enough outlets in my house. I had extension cords plugged into power strips, plugged into a multi-outlet. The two power strips [+ surge protectors!], I bought went in my bedroom, and studio [computer[s], clock radio, printer, heater[s], humidifier[s], lamps, & more lamps, et al], and quite probably have saved me from a looming electrical fire. These are extremely well designed, and well made. My favorite part [besides the rotating outlets], is the fabulous sense of humor used for all occasions. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Jaxon

customer_reviews.title: NO WASTED SPACE...YOU CAN USE ALL OUTLETS
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying outlet strips, only to find out I could only use 3 or 2 of the 6 outlets on the strip. How many of you purchased the "normal cheap outlet strips) only to find out not all items have the "normal" plug? If you have, you know what I mean. With this strip you can USE ALL OUTLETS BECAUSE THEY ROTATE IN 3 DIFFERENT POSITIONS. don't waste your money buying the outlet strips that won't let you use ALL THE OUTLETS!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S.

customer_reviews.title: I like this, it is very compact and hopefully will ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this, it is very compact and hopefully will provide the protection that I need. The rotating outlets are great. I have purchased others with fixed outlets and inevitably I find myself losing use of one or two outlets because the plugs (some) will not fit next to each other. I don't like having to rearrange and switch every time I add a piece of equipment. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Janice

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Strip Surge Protector with Moveable Plug-in’s
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I was doubtful on this strip surge protector, but boy was I wrong. It is fabulous!!! First, the plug-in fits flat against wall. The outlets are moveable so you can use EVERY plug in no matter how big the plug. I have it used for our TV, satellite, DVD player, sound bar and surround sound. Love this so much that I plan to order a few more. HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is really a product I love. First the rotating outlets allows you to use those charging plugs without blocking other outlets. Really a innovating and handy design.Then there are the cord clips that help keep the cords being plugged in some sort of order. And there is the 8 ft cord! Can plug this in to the outlet near my computer desk and run it around the back of the computer desk with length to spare. One of the handiest products I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: RBINCC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This product solved several issues for me: 1) difficulty using all the outlets in a strip because of the wall warts I had to plug in 2) Neatness of the wires and 3) clean power. I was most surprised at the third, as the first two were why I selected this item. But issues I was having with my stereo were cleaned up as soon as I started using this power strip. Great job and I'll get more when I need them!
customer_reviews.author: Peter F

customer_reviews.title: Great for electrical distribution behind a wall mounted TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go behind my wall-mounted television. I have power to two power supplies, the TV plug, and a plug-in power block. The rotatable outlets enabled me to keep everything as close to the wall as possible. I wasn't thrilled about the mounting holes in the strip, but they worked well enough. I was able to make my installation nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mantic Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The first noticeable thing was the weight of the package. After opening packaging I realize that most of the weight comes from the power cord which is 14 AWG wire and awesome. Swivel designs are not new but this unit is quite attractive and seemingly well constructed. The surge protection is advertised at 2160 joules which is adequate if true, don't know how to test this w/o ruining the unit. All aspects of buying ,delivery and customer service are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design solves power plug puzzle
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me, you probably have a number of odd-shaped power supplies, phone chargers and electric cords. Plugging them in at the same time, at the same place can be a challenge. If you've ever had to daisy-chain power strips, use unsightly cord extensions, or plug-in half your devices across the room, this product is for you. The rotating outlets create 3 custom surfaces letting you stagger your devices. You decide where the plugs are. The super long cord makes the product easy to locate anywhere you need it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: The first problem I had with this is the extreme out-gassing of what are likely toxic odors from both the cord and the outlet body. I had to put it outside to out-gas for at least a day. I do not usually bring such poisons into my home. I have now plugged it in and I hope that the VOC emissions subside significantly later.
customer_reviews.author: Brians

customer_reviews.title: Need only 2 power strips now and everything can be plugged in!
customer_reviews.text: Need only 2 power strips now and everything can be plugged in! Makes the cord spaghetti easier to manage and allows mostly everything to be plugged into one strip. If I get rid of one of my electronics, I'll be able to use this one for all plugs. I didn't rate the WiFi signal because I don't use that function.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome functionality
customer_reviews.text: This cord is awesome! I love the functionality of the rotation outlets. I have a home office and work with 2 monitors, laptop, printer, alexa, etc. So many cords and I wasn't happy with the traditional outlet that I had. This is perfect and allows me to plug in everything I need, including large and small plugs! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: karapg

customer_reviews.title: A must buy ..
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a lot of power strips, but this one Tops them all. It's a must buy if you're looking for one. Y'all can twist and turn it to accommodate all your needs. I have 2 Apple cords, 2 computers, and 2 Alexa's all plugged in and still have room. I sometimes write a review and should write more .. but I make sure I write when a product is Great. So if you're looking for a Power Strip, look No further ... buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Monica

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive design
customer_reviews.text: I installed this Power Strip Surge Protector under my desk to manage power connections for 2 computers, 2 printers, cable modem, router, hub, and more. Four of the plugs have adapters, so the 8 rotating-outlets were just what I needed. Previously I had short extension cords coming off the power strip to accommodate the adapters but these are no longer necessary. The connection of the various equipment is better organized and cleaner. The rotating-outlets is a brilliant idea.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fenske

customer_reviews.title: Can't Believe This Has Not Developed Before
customer_reviews.text: In the age of COVID I have a make-shift office at home. There are not enough outlets. I have several different devices, chargers, etc to hook up. All with different sized connections. This surge bar allows to connect all of them by being able to rotate the actual plug outlet. Simply Awesome. Highly Recommend the product and vendor
customer_reviews.author: JCSeminoles

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have not yet had another spike that killed my blu-ray player but adding this device gives me piece of mind and hopefully saves my wallet from taking another hit. Am planning on adding a couple more soon as I am making all the necessary plans in the event of an earthquake here in LA. I have purchased a generator to keep my lights on but it is not an inverter so hope these power strips will prevent any surges from ruining any electrical equipment.
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life.
customer_reviews.text: Classic first world problem: My bulky AC adapters take up too much room on my powerstrip preventing me from plugging in other devices! This Echogear power strip is perfect fitting all your AC adapters into one place. I have a ROKU, myCircle, Blueray Player, Cable Modem, Wifi Router & a Ring Security Base station. They all have their own AC adapters that are bulky and have their own orientations in which they plug in. With this device I can power them ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a surge protector that would accommodate the transformer plugs that are on a lot of the Dept 56 village items. I have a large Dept. 56 Halloween village and have a lot of transformer plugs. This worked great. You can move the individual sockets so you can use every plug. Before I got this one I would have to skip plugs and have to use more surge protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love the rotating outlets!!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly & was exactly what I was expecting. I love how some of the outlets rotate so you don’t waste any because of large plugs. The only thing that might make it better is a shorter cord option. Most people probably want a long cord but I’m using it directly under the wall outlet so I didn’t need the extra cord length.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Green

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little difficult to review something I just bought without giving it enough time to prove itself. I have plugged it in and I am happy so far. It works as advertised and I like the ability to plug in multiple items with the various size of connections. Kinda makes you wonder why other power strips aren't capable of accomplishing this simple design. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: william brennan

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I know about this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Finally an answer for multiple black box power cords plugged in without losing half the plug in locations on the strip. Rotating outlet locations are amazing and flat plug at the wall means the furniture can be close to the wall. I am more than thrilled -- and over an outlet strip of all things!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean P

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality and Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: The design of this power strip is excellent. Each of the plugs can be rotated so that large plugs and those that are oddly shaped do not interfere with the next plug in line. The unit is very sturdy and well built. I've tried other designs that try to accomplish the same re-alignment of plugs, but none work as will as this one does. I highly recommend it. In fact, I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hessick

customer_reviews.title: Good Power Strip
customer_reviews.text: This power strip works great. The only reason I did't give it 5 stars is because I just received it and I don't know about the long term use. The strip makes it easy to connect odd shaped plugs and plugs that are oversize.
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best surge protector out there!! If you have a bunch of bulky plugs this is awesome, because you can swivel the outlets in a direction that doesn't interfere with the other plugs. The wire to the wall is good length for a power strip it looks to be about 4-5ft. Lastly, the plug to the wall is flat and does not protrude too much. LOVE THIS PRODUCT! WOULD AND WILL BUY AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product will purchase another
customer_reviews.text: You will never have a plug you can't use. But I should have gotten the larger strip. I have few outlets in my bedroom and with TV, Chargers, Streaming devices, Lamps and Difussers I don't have enough plugs. I love the way you can turn the outlets to accommodate the larger plugs.
customer_reviews.author: imrjb_49509

customer_reviews.title: Easily handles hard-to-fit-in "brick" plugs
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a Belkin power strip, but after a week it still hadn't shipped (very unlike Amazon). So I cancelled it and ordered the Echogear after reading all the positive reviews. It arrived within 2 days. I love the tilting outlets because they enable me to plug in those "brick" plugs that normally take up two spaces. All 8 of my plugs are nicely spaced. The power strip looks good and feels substantial.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Graner

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied With This Product
customer_reviews.text: I just got the ECHOGEAR 8 Outlet yesterday and its great. I love that I can rotate the outlet to one side and rotate the next outlet to the opposite side. This works great when you have multiple items you need to plug in, but due to the size of the plug, a standard 8 plug outlet won't work. I will definitely get another one when the time comes. I also like that the cord is 8' long and the plug is flat. To date, this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Scattered throughout my house are power strips that are half utilized because some large adaptor gets in the way. With my new PC set-up I wanted to reduce the clutter as much as possible and this helped immensely. All the outlets on this power strip are being used thanks to the rotation. Plus the wires are pretty manageable with the added wire holder at the end. The cord length is fairly long (around 6') so the power strip can be tucked away and not in my way. I should have bought this years ago, it's so handy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No grounding (green indicator) light
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, there is No green grounding light to let you know that your stuff is safe. I plugged in 1 small alarm clock and only the red power light comes on. Without that light, I have no idea when the surge protector trips and is no longer protecting my equipment. Basically, I have a power strip. :(
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the thing I needed...
customer_reviews.text: Often times I've had to sacrifice quality in order to find a small enough surge Protector to fit my need. This particular device not only has a fine build quality (sturdy, compact ,and great cable management ) but it operates far and above my need. The rotational outlets are a great feature and 2160 Joules of Surge Protection is a must. I highly recommend this particular model for these features.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE it!.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My old one was great but this one is so much better. I love the ability to USE all the outlets. Plugs have gotten bigger and bigger so I could not use half of the old strips stations. The extra length in the cord was also very useful. It is has very sturdy unit. I think I got the best one available for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles to you!

customer_reviews.title: Big Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old standard outlet/protector. The rotating outlets works great for the variety of plug sizes and has maximized the amount of space helping to clean up my under desk mess of cables. The length of its own ac cable it longer too.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper in CA

customer_reviews.title: Versatile power strip
customer_reviews.text: This power strip works well since you can arrange it in different configurations to accommodate various plugs. Seems sturdy and of good quality. I have several appliances which have large plug units and the plug always blocks one of the other outlets. This allows you to swivel the sections around so you can utilize all the sockets.
customer_reviews.author: June M

customer_reviews.title: Great surge protector so far
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can move the outlets and that I could wall mount it. I put this behind my TV so could move/hide all of my cables and power behind my TV. So far's so good, it's only been in use for 1 day. Suggestion for wall mounting. Have template for wall mounting printed on the inside of the box, I made my own but it would have been nice to have simply cut out the template and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Janil

customer_reviews.title: All my plugs and wall warts on ONE strip!
customer_reviews.text: What I liked is everything. Without planning at all, I plugged in one after another plug, ordinary two prong up to wall warts two of which covered three sockets on my straight strips. TWO straight power strips would not hve accepted what this one just did! I almost ordered two. Good thing, This one took in everything I had to plug.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL E WOLF

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and useful. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. We attached it to the back of the desk (the flat bottom is on a vertical surface) and it takes all sorts of plugs. Just spin them around to make them fit. Nothing has fallen out though I do place to smaller, lighter ones on the bottom and keep the heavier ones on the top. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Netsirk

customer_reviews.title: Great flexibility, Space-saving
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy surge protector/power strip. I plugged in large power blocks with no ground plug upside down on plugs with the ground to the bottom of the surge protector, so that I could save upside down plugs (ground facing up) for large power blocks with a ground. This was all so that I could make sure the surge protector could lay flat on the ground. It’s a great space saver, allowing you to plug in multiple large power blocks next to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fits my need!
customer_reviews.text: The ECHOGEAR Power Strip Surge Protector perfectly fits my need for power cord organization. I previously used up all my electrical outlets for the tv, cable box, router, etc. and had no room for other electrical items. The ECHOGEAR Power Strip allowed me to neatly move all my cords to one spot. The best thing about the Power Strip is that it accommodates the large plugs that otherwise take up a large amount of space. The cords are now organized and out of the way!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! I have a tight space behind my computer desk ( I still have one) I needed more surge protectors to accommodate more devices and chargers. Plus each device has a different rotation to the plug. This solved my problem. From 2 surge protectors in 2 outlets to 1 surge protector in 1 outlet. Looks great and cleaned up a whole tangled mess behind the desk. The longer power cord was a bonus, although I didn't need it - some people may.
customer_reviews.author: MSMom

customer_reviews.title: Love this power strip! I can finally use all the outlets.
customer_reviews.text: With all past power strips, I can never use all the outlets at once. With hair driers, phone chargers, and alarm clocks all using one and a half spaces, it seems like I can only use half of the described outlets. Not with this one! I can use all the outlets with no issue! I love that they rotate smoothly. I would buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Greatest power strip EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a desk in home for most of the afternoon, and like having everything in one place. Phone charger, laptop, lamp, TV, Roku, ect. This power strip allows that to happen, in an organized way! All the electrical adapters are different, and since power strip rotates each sock, it was very easy to connect all. Highly advise you try this one, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Nix Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Musicians
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is in a rock band and Jazz band. He needed something that had a long chord and that could fit multiple plugs. He likes the way these turn so you can fit those big bulky square plugs in along with other regular plugs. He has had zero issues with it and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sangtaitai

customer_reviews.title: Every Plug Available
customer_reviews.text: Needed 8 available plugs in one strip. My computer desk fits flush with the wall with no room so all the cords had to be plugged in under the desk then pushed flush with wall. Didn't have room for multiple power strips. This one took care of that.
customer_reviews.author: TommyGJ

customer_reviews.title: Simple Power with Multiple outlets!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Power Strip/surge protector because of it's simplicity, durability and what it offers. Especially 8 outlets, most only offer 6 like the one I replaced which I noticed was exuding heat from it. It appears this item is great quality and is doing the job as I had hoped. Loving the great cost savings as well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Woolard

customer_reviews.title: Accommodates All Plugs Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on other products I chose this one. It accommodated everything I needed to plug in, whereas the others I looked at would not have. The entire surge protector is quality built and easy to rotate so I could fit in and use all the different sized electrical plugs . I'm very happy with my purchase and recommend this one over others because of its versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Info seeker

customer_reviews.title: Good organization tool
customer_reviews.text: This rotating outlet surge protector really came in handy. I had a bunch of items that needed to be powered near my router and this enabled me to use many larger plugs side by side. If you have a lot of items nearby needing power, this could be a perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Piece of Equipment - Allows me to do what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: The key for me is this allows me to connect a variety of retro game consoles, some have standard size plugs some big brick plugs. The ability to rotate the outlets allows everything to fit. Main power cord is very heavy duty. Overall this looks like a solid piece of equipment and the high Joule rating gives me some peace of mind compared to cheap units.
customer_reviews.author: Vince G

customer_reviews.title: Can accommodate all sizes and shapes!
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome! I have very fee outlets at home and all are in hard to reach places so I have to use power strips everywhere. Almost all of my strips have one to three unused outlets due to oversized or awkward shaped wall plugs, this can accommodate all on one strip utilizing all of the outlets!!! Brilliant!! Also gives a generous cord length! Heavy duty, not cheaply made!!
customer_reviews.author: Libra_lisa

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it is too late to return this as the time limit expired, otherwise I would do so. Although this product claims to have the ability to contain 2160 Joules of surge, In reality it is less effective than the one I replaced, which claimed protection of only 1800 Joules. I know now that I need to find one that actually works or I'm going to have to replace my computer and perhaps television. I recommend not purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tom O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This power strip is exactly what I needed to plug in my TV, DVD Player and little heater. The cord was plenty long enough to reach the nearest wall plug and strong enough to handle all three items.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very well built power strip
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good power strip. A little high in price for me and lacks another 2 outlets. But overall very good and especially like the way i can use different sized adapters without having to cover over an outlet or forcing adapter into a smaller spot.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Field

customer_reviews.title: but I’m pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: Just have a few days experience, and have only hooked up one of the two. It replaced a 6 outlet strip that had longitudinaly placed outlets. It had 4 wall warts. The ability to rotate the outlets on the Echogear strip means that I was able to plug everything in without covering any other outlets. Big plus! Don’t know about durability yet, but I’m pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but...
customer_reviews.text: The power strip does the job I needed it to, but there is a rather loud hum when it is powered on that I do not like. Otherwise, it is great. The annoyance of the hum in an otherwise silent work area can be very distracting otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility and Performance
customer_reviews.text: I now have three of these. They are excellent and well constructed. They solve the problem I have had for years; plugging in items with transformers of all types into one surge protector/power strip. The rotating sockets are an admirable solution. Well done, and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: relaxretired

customer_reviews.title: Very versitle in handling all plug shapes and sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I've always had problems with other surge protectors. Half the outlets are affected by plug sizes and shapes so many outlets are not available. I was able to use this unit to replace two others and still have four outlets still available. The rotating outlets allow lots of versetiity.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Gurman

customer_reviews.title: Best outlet strip
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite surge strip. It's even better than the one I have that allows me to rotate 360 degrees because this one lets me move the entire head to get it out of the way of the adjacent outlet. It's a must have for all our devices that take up a large space when charging. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Outlets to plug in stuff and the outlet swivel up and down
customer_reviews.text: I really love this power strip here are some things I love about the power strip multiple Outlets to plug in a lot of your electronics and ect. And another good thing about the power strip is it the outlet swivel up and down I would recommend this power strip to everybody really happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Dan Brito

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to protect my entertainment and it is just perfect for that. With all the different sizes and plugins I have. I have been looking for this kind of product. It has more that met my expectations. I very good product if you have several different size of plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Agee A Reed

customer_reviews.title: You need one of these!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! You can fill every plug just like the picture. Just turn the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Softwaregirl

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Solid. Really as I expected. I have other products from them I liked also so I expected the same level of quality. I used it for all the computer desktop station that had a mess of bulky adapters. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: K

product_meta.title: ECHOGEAR Power Strip Surge Protector with 8 Rotating-Outlets, Cable Management, Flat Plug & Fireproof MOV - 2160 Joules of Surge Protection - Expand Outlet Capacity & Keep Your Gear Safe
feature_bullets: No more wasting covered up outlets. This power strip includes 6 flexible rotating outlets that keep power adapters out of the way and two fixed side outlets for good measure.
Cable management hooks keep cords aligned and easily manageable. No more untangling and fussing with any chaotic cord situations.
Don't let outside electrical interference damage your devices. This surge protector filters outside interference to fuel your electronics with clean power while keeping your outlets safe.

Protect your devices from electrical surges with 2160 joules of surge protection. A 2160 joule rating is top of the line and is the best option for handling multiple electronics and larger appliances.
Tested and Proven to be a trusted partner. UL safety certified with a 5 year, 25k connected equipment warranty. Your electronics won't be "hertz" with ECHOGEAR.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,896 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
